sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-lock", templateUrl: "lock.component.html" }) export class LockComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { focus; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]; body.classList.add("lock-page"); } ngOnDestroy() { var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]; body.classList.remove("lock-page"); } }

Joe Gardner

Unlock
